The following are the prominent features of the work : -

r. lt presents the subject in a systematic form. The general principles and laws of the science are first clearly stated and illus· trated3 then the words are treated in their etymological order.

3. lt gives great prominence to the derivation of English words supplying to a large degree the place of an English etymology.

5. lt presents the entire subject in a form thoroughly adapted to school use in classes·
